body_html:
@ezyang I need help with jenkins: in the test.sh step I don't find the artifacts in torch/cpp_build/build that were created by build.sh. In particular I need the test_jit executable as well as libtorch to run the test.
I naively thought there was some connection between steps, but there isn't.

What's the best way to ensure that libtorch artifacts are there so that I can run tests for the C++ part? Thanks a lot in advance.
